Return the SRI hash of a CRAN package source using nix hash path --sri path

Source: R/nix_hash.R
hash_cran.Rd

Return the SRI hash of a CRAN package source using nix hash path --sri path

Usage

hash_cran(repo_url)

Arguments

repo_url

URL to CRAN package source
